page.title: 15A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My name is Rebecca Davis.I am one of only two people living inside the rectangle allocated to our school.I enjoy living at Langore.There are many people who live in the village they are all nice and easy to get on with.We have a lot of things to entertain us with.There are fetes every summer which once every three years are held inside our area.We also have disco's every so often in the Parish hall.Recently we have been having fund raising events for a childrens play area.We think that the play area has improved the village quite alot.The children have stopped playing on the village green which has pleased quite a few people.The village is surrounded by farm land and farmers dont mind us playing in the fields as long as we shut all the gates afterwards.
